body: I'm fucking confuse, wtf am I reading
why don't people write some decent plot for the sake of humanity of this world..... ik this world sucks but please

What the fuck is this? I genuinely don't understand what happened. Anyways, I'm happy as long as the whore gets to raise her devil's spawn all alone and the ugly fuck of a teacher rots in jail. At least Gin-chan dogded a bullet.

This is real a wishy-washy story when read chronologically. The first chapter having her fuck her old crush really doesn't do anything other than create ntr shock for those that read chapter by chapter, but reading it all together fucks up the story since chronologically she was already in love with the teacher at that point and planning to start a new life with him and their baby. It  seemed like it was leading into her claiming the kid as her friends while loving the teacher on the low like most ntr endings would do, but that doesn't happen so wtf was the point of that chapter? She didn't do it because she still loved him or because she wanted to pin the child on him either so what was the point, cuz she technically cheated on her baby daddy with someone she stopped seeing as a love interest? It feels like the artist was too scared to go full ntr so they abandoned it at the last moment despite already laying the seeds. This chapter is also weird as its abrupt and uunnecessary.
Only one category... Is that possible?
Glad that the endings is left up to interpretation. Treating a fictional character by real world standards isn't really a good idea anyway.

I’d say she got what she deserved. Coming to realize her addiction to the teachers dong made her miss out on her pure love, now she a single mom lol go figure.
